MonsterTrait.Name: Rampage
MonsterTrait.Text: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The gnoll makes two melee attacks with its spear or two ranged attacks with its longbow.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Spear
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.
